extended_user_information.en: Enter 6-inch & Footlong prices for all 3 tiers. Select at least 1 and up to 5 local options and enter 6-inch & Footlong prices for each.
Enter prices for all Sides, Drinks, & Extras. Select local options and enter prices for Sides and Extras, if any.
Enter 6-inch & Footlong prices for Breakfast Sandwiches. Select local option, if any. Select time Breakfast is served.
TRUE = Store serves breakfast, FALSE = Store does not serve breakfast
TRUE = Store serves breakfast all day, FALSE = Store does not serve breakfast all day
TRUE = Store serves coffee, FALSE = Store does not serve coffee
TRUE = Store serves omelets, FALSE = Store does not serve omelets
TRUE = Store serves Coca-Cola, FALSE = Store does not serve Coca-Cola
TRUE = Store serves fountain drinks, FALSE = Store does not serve fountain drinks
TRUE = Store serves bottled drinks, FALSE = Store does not serve bottled drinks
TRUE = Store serves Fuze, FALSE = Store does not serve Fuze
This setting must be set at the PLAYER level only
